propel.core.counters

Class ModuloCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.counters.ModuloCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICounter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedModuloCounter, SharedModuloCounterLight

    public class ModuloCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICounter
    Class providing modulo counter functionality. In other words, this counter wraps around when maximum is reached.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long DEFAULT_MAX_VALUE
      The default largest number that can be held by the counter
      static long DEFAULT_MIN_VALUE
      The default smallest number that can be held by the counter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModuloCounter()
      Default constructor, initializes with default minimum and maximum bounds.
      ModuloCounter(long maxValue)
      Initializes counter with a specified maximum value.
      ModuloCounter(long maxValue, long minValue)
      Initializes counter with a specified maximum value and minimum value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getMaxValue()
      Returns the maximum value of the counter
      long getMinValue()
      Returns the minimum value of the counter
      long getValue()
      Returns the counter value
      long next()
      Increments the counter and returns the next value
      void reset()
      Resets the counter to the minimum value

      • ModuloCounter

        public ModuloCounter(long maxValue)
        Initializes counter with a specified maximum value.
        Parameters:
        maxValue - The maximum counter value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the maximum is less than or equal to minimum, or equal to Long.MAX_VALUE

      • ModuloCounter

        public ModuloCounter(long maxValue,
             long minValue)
        Initializes counter with a specified maximum value and minimum value.
        Parameters:
        maxValue - The maximum counter value.
        minValue - The minimum counter value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the maximum is less than or equal to minimum, or equal to Long.MAX_VALUE
